name: Snake prototype
description:
A snake game prototype.

Click on the game window if you can't control the snake.

Controls

There are three ways to control the snake:

1) Arrow keys.

2) Mouse (Click and drag on game window to change the snakes direction).

3) Swipe on a touchscreen.

Rules

Red circle makes the snake grow.

Blue ball makes the snake invincible for 10 seconds.

Please support if you like the game! :)
